description: Logical Model for the graphical reprensentation of the respective Art-Decor Model

element.short: Quantitative result of the antigen test
element.definition: A measured amount (or an amount that can potentially be measured). Note that measured amounts include amounts that are not precisely quantified, including amounts involving arbitrary units and floating currencies.
element.comment: The context of use may frequently define what kind of quantity this is and therefore what kind of units can be used. The context of use may also restrict the values for the comparator.

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
